channel.title: Distros on OrganGrinderrr
channel.description: Recent content in Distros on OrganGrinderrr

item.title: My Dotfiles
item.description: Linux distros # Ubuntu, Archlinux, Gentoo, NixOS, Qubes OS, Tails Personally I would kill Qubes and Tails already, rather than chosing a distro designed for a single purpose, I would rather chose a general purpose. As everything in qubes can be implemented in other general purpose systems. Using Qubes and tails in my humble opinion not doing you any good as it shouts out that you are special, or more than special.
